# !!! WARNING !!! AUTO-GENERATED FILE, PLEASE DO NOT MODIFY IT AND USE
# https://docs.platformio.org/page/projectconf/section_env_build.html#build-flags
#
# If you need to override existing CMake configuration or add extra,
# please create `CMakeListsUser.txt` in the root of project.
# The `CMakeListsUser.txt` will not be overwritten by PlatformIO.



set(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES "flower_basic;flower_lights;flower_emotional_standalone;flower_peripheral;flower_choreography;flower_excited_standalone;neo_pixel;personality_lighting;voltage_sensor;mux_dip_switch;stall_guard_tuning_flower;stall_guard_tuning_tmc2130;controller;tmc2130;tmc2209;" CACHE STRING "Build Types reflect PlatformIO Environments" FORCE)


SET(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/bin/avr-gcc")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/bin/avr-g++")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "-fno-exceptions -fno-threadsafe-statics -fpermissive -std=gnu++17 -Os -Wall -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -flto -mmcu=atmega328p")
SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "-std=gnu11 -fno-fat-lto-objects -Os -Wall -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -flto -mmcu=atmega328p")

SET(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 11)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)

if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "flower_basic")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_AVR_ATmega328P')
    add_definitions(-D'register=')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=16000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_AVR')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10808')
    add_definitions(-D'__AVR_ATmega328P__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Pcbs")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Microcontroller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Flower")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logging")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Math")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_basic/AceSorting/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_basic/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_basic/SerialTransfer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_basic/RunningMedian")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_basic/AccelStepper/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_basic/TMCStepper/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/cores/MiniCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/variants/standard")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Choreography")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Commands")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Debug")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/I2C")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Lights")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Personality")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sequences")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/AVR_examples/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Optiboot_flasher/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/flower_basic/*.*
    )
endif()

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/tmc2209/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "personality_lighting")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_AVR_ATmega328P')
    add_definitions(-D'register=')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=16000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_AVR')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10808')
    add_definitions(-D'__AVR_ATmega328P__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Personality")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Flower")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logging")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Lights")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Math")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/personality_lighting/AceSorting/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/personality_lighting/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/personality_lighting/SerialTransfer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/personality_lighting/RunningMedian")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/personality_lighting/AccelStepper/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/personality_lighting/TMCStepper/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/cores/MiniCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/variants/standard")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Choreography")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Commands")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Debug")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/I2C")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Microcontroller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Pcbs")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sequences")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/AVR_examples/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Optiboot_flasher/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/personality_lighting/*.*
    )

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Lights")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Microcontroller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Pcbs")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Personality")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sequences")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/AVR_examples/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Optiboot_flasher/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sequences")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/EEPROM/src")

    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_AVR_ATmega328P')
    add_definitions(-D'register=')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=16000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_AVR')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10808')
    add_definitions(-D'__AVR_ATmega328P__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Math")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/voltage_sensor/AceSorting/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/voltage_sensor/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/voltage_sensor/SerialTransfer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/voltage_sensor/RunningMedian")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/voltage_sensor/AccelStepper/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/voltage_sensor/TMCStepper/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/cores/MiniCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/variants/standard")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Choreography")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Commands")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Debug")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Flower")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/I2C")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Lights")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logging")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Microcontroller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Pcbs")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Personality")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sequences")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/AVR_examples/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Optiboot_flasher/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/voltage_sensor/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "stall_guard_tuning_flower")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_AVR_ATmega328P')
    add_definitions(-D'register=')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=16000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_AVR')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10808')
    add_definitions(-D'__AVR_ATmega328P__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Microcontroller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Flower")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logging")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Math")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/stall_guard_tuning_flower/AceSorting/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/stall_guard_tuning_flower/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/stall_guard_tuning_flower/SerialTransfer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/stall_guard_tuning_flower/RunningMedian")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/stall_guard_tuning_flower/AccelStepper/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/stall_guard_tuning_flower/TMCStepper/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/cores/MiniCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/variants/standard")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Choreography")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Commands")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Debug")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/I2C")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Lights")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Pcbs")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Personality")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sequences")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/AVR_examples/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Optiboot_flasher/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/stall_guard_tuning_flower/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "neo_pixel")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_AVR_ATmega328P')
    add_definitions(-D'register=')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=16000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_AVR')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10808')
    add_definitions(-D'__AVR_ATmega328P__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logging")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Lights")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Math")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/neo_pixel/AceSorting/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/neo_pixel/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/neo_pixel/SerialTransfer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/neo_pixel/RunningMedian")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/neo_pixel/AccelStepper/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/neo_pixel/TMCStepper/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/cores/MiniCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/variants/standard")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Choreography")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Commands")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Debug")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Flower")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/I2C")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Microcontroller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Pcbs")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Personality")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sequences")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/AVR_examples/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Optiboot_flasher/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/neo_pixel/*.*
    )
endif()
if (CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE MATCHES "tmc2130")
    add_definitions(-D'PLATFORMIO=50200')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_AVR_ATmega328P')
    add_definitions(-D'register=')
    add_definitions(-D'F_CPU=16000000L')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO_ARCH_AVR')
    add_definitions(-D'ARDUINO=10808')
    add_definitions(-D'__AVR_ATmega328P__')

    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Microcontroller")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/tmc2130/AceSorting/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/tmc2130/FastLED/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/tmc2130/SerialTransfer/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/tmc2130/RunningMedian")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/tmc2130/AccelStepper/src")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/tmc2130/TMCStepper/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SoftwareSerial/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/cores/MiniCore")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/variants/standard")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Choreography")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Commands")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Debug")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Flower")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/I2C")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Lights")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Logging")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Math")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Pcbs")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Personality")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sensors")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Sequences")
    include_directories("${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/tmc2130/CircularBuffer")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/AVR_examples/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/EEPROM/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Optiboot_flasher/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/SPI1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/framework-arduino-avr-minicore/libraries/Wire1/src")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/lib/gcc/avr/7.3.0/include-fixed")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/toolchain-atmelavr/avr/include")
    include_directories("$ENV{HOME}/.platformio/packages/tool-unity")

    FILE(GLOB_RECURSE EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/.pio/libdeps/tmc2130/*.*
    )
endif()

FILE(GLOB_RECURSE SRC_LIST
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/*.*
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/*.*
)

list(APPEND SRC_LIST ${EXTRA_LIB_SOURCES})
